about.overview: Technoviz Automation presents a Centre of Excellence (CoE) on Smart Manufacturing designed to prepare students for real industrial environments. This initiative focuses on Industry 4.0, IIoT, Smart Automation, AI-driven manufacturing, and digital transformation. The CoE operates on a subscription-based model with zero upfront investment for institutions.

coe.title: Centre of Excellence on Smart Manufacturing
coe.description: Industry-aligned training program designed to build job-ready skills in PLC, IIoT, Smart Automation, and Industry 4.0 through hands-on learning and real industrial use cases.

highlights.title: Student Enrollment & Portal Access
highlights.description: Students enroll in the Smart Manufacturing SLM program and receive lifetime access to the Technoviz Automation learning portal, including modules, labs, assignments, and continuous updates.

highlights.title: Self-Learning Through Structured Modules
highlights.description: DIY learning model with step-by-step theory, lab manuals, industrial examples, and hands-on exercises.

highlights.title: Hands-On Practice & Industrial Use Cases
highlights.description: Students work on real industrial problem statements to gain confidence and practical exposure.

highlights.title: Online Assessment & Skill Evaluation
highlights.description: Assessment evaluates conceptual understanding, practical skills, and industry problem-solving ability.

highlights.title: Certification
highlights.description: Instant, auto-generated, verifiable digital certificate linked to portal records.

highlights.title: Lifetime Career & Startup Support
highlights.description: Continuous learning updates, career guidance, interview preparation, startup mentorship, and industry networking.
